p.d: Every week, Mathieu Pichette makes the acquaintance of three young French-speakers. Together, they discover a place, an original activity or a larger-than-life character. A very special house, an astonishing festival, a breathtaking fairground ride or unusual restaurants: prepare yourself for strangeness! Directed by: Felix Tanguay (season 1, Canada, 2017) Presented by: Mathieu Pichette
